info.abstract:
[Type] Flow control.
[Behaviour] Call the execution of another workflow.
[Parameters] - id : set to identifier of the workflow to be executed. - name : set to name of the workflow to be executed (negleted in case "id" is set). - order : flag used to select the workflow in case of homonymy (negleted in case "id" is set): - set to "first" to consider the first workflow with the same name in the session; - set to "last" to consider the last workflow with the same name in the session (default). - args : set to workflow arguments. - run : set to "yes" in case the target workflow has to be executed (default).
